Class dominoes.Play

Class dominoes.Play 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----dominoes.Play
public class Play
extends Object
This class represents a play in the dominoes game. It is a bone and a location on the layout to play on (either left or right).

LEFT
Constant for the left end of the layout
RIGHT
Constant for the right end of the layout

Play(Bone, int)
Create a play object which represents that the specified bone is going to be played on the specified end of the layout.

bone()
The bone being played with this play
end()
The end of the layout being played on

LEFT 
  public final static int LEFT
Constant for the left end of the layout
RIGHT 
  public final static int RIGHT
Constant for the right end of the layout

Play 
  public Play(Bone bone_,
              int end_)
Create a play object which represents that the specified bone is going to be played on the specified end of the layout.
Parameters:
bone_ - the bone to play
end_ - the end of the layout to play on

bone 
  public Bone bone()
The bone being played with this play
Returns:
the bone being played
end 
  public int end()
The end of the layout being played on
Returns:
the end of the layout being played on
